# **geonapi**

[![Build
Status](https://github.com/eblondel/geonapi/actions/workflows/r-cmd-check.yml/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://github.com/eblondel/geonapi/actions/workflows/r-cmd-check.yml)
[![Github_Status_Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Github-0.8--1-blue.svg)](https://github.com/eblondel/geonapi)
[![CRAN_Status_Badge](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/geonapi)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=geonapi)
[![CRAN
checks](https://badges.cranchecks.info/worst/geosapi.svg)](https://cran.r-project.org/web/checks/check_results_geonapi.html)
[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/DOI/10.5281/zenodo.1345012.svg)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.1345012)

`geonapi`: R Interface to GeoNetwork API

### Citation

We thank in advance people that use `geonapi` for citing it in their
work / publication(s). For this, please use the citation provided at
this link
[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/DOI/10.5281/zenodo.1345012.svg)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.1345012)

### Sponsors

Many thanks to the following organizations that have provided fundings
for strenghtening the `geonapi` package:

[![](https://www.fao.org/fileadmin/templates/family-farming-decade/images/FAO-IFAD-Logos/FAO-Logo-EN.svg)](https://www.fao.org/home/en/)
[![](https://letg.cnrs.fr/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/logo_letg.png)](https://letg.cnrs.fr)
[![](https://www.inrae.fr/themes/custom/inrae_socle/logo.svg)](https://www.inrae.fr)

# Package index

## All functions

- [`GNAbstractManager`](https://eblondel.github.io/geonapi/reference/GNAbstractManager.md)
  : GNAbstractManager
- [`GNLegacyAPIManager`](https://eblondel.github.io/geonapi/reference/GNLegacyAPIManager.md)
  : GNLegacyAPIManager
- [`GNManager`](https://eblondel.github.io/geonapi/reference/GNManager.md)
  : GeoNetwork REST API Manager
- [`GNOpenAPIManager`](https://eblondel.github.io/geonapi/reference/GNOpenAPIManager.md)
  : GNOpenAPIManager
- [`GNPriv`](https://eblondel.github.io/geonapi/reference/GNPriv.md) : A
  GeoNetwork privilege configuration
- [`GNPrivConfiguration`](https://eblondel.github.io/geonapi/reference/GNPrivConfiguration.md)
  : A GeoNetwork privilege configuration
- [`GNRESTRequest`](https://eblondel.github.io/geonapi/reference/GNRESTRequest.md)
  : GeoNetwork REST API REST Request
- [`GNUtils`](https://eblondel.github.io/geonapi/reference/GNUtils.md) :
  GeoNetwork REST API Manager Utils
- [`GNVersion`](https://eblondel.github.io/geonapi/reference/GNVersion.md)
  : A GeoNetwork version
- [`geonapi`](https://eblondel.github.io/geonapi/reference/geonapi.md)
  [`geonapi-package`](https://eblondel.github.io/geonapi/reference/geonapi.md)
  : 'GeoNetwork' API R Interface
